message:
Mutable default argument detected! This is a classic Python bug.
Default values are created ONCE when the function is defined.

evidence.snippet: def store_user_sessions(session_id: str, sessions: Dict = {}):
context_after: All calls share the same dictionary!

extra.lines:
def store_user_sessions(session_id: str, sessions: Dict = {}):
    """
    PATTERN-001: Mutable default argument
    All calls share the same dictionary!
    """
    sessions[session_id] = True
    return sessions
extra.message:
Mutable default argument detected! This is a classic Python bug.
Default values are created ONCE when the function is defined.
